cards.title: Artificier
setup: Start the game with the Archive Gauntlets in play.
powers: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Relic, you may put it into play, otherwise put it into your hand.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Hero deals a target 1 Energy damage. They regain HP equal to the damage dealt.
One Player draws a card, if it is an Equipment, they may play it.
Choose a Villain target. Increase damage dealt to that target by 1 until the start of your next turn.

openingLines.default: For the sake of the world, and all knowledge within, you must be stopped.
openingLines.ExWeaverCharacter: I will not let you destroy all knowledge... or the universe!

cards.title: Archive Gauntlets
body: At the start of the game, put 5 tokens into the Mana Pool.
At the start of your turn, add a token to the Mana Pool.
power: Add a token to the Mana pool.

flavorQuotes.text: I made these gauntlets to{BR}symbiotically collect the knowledge you have, and grant you access to the Archives.

cards.title: Mana Burn
body: Remove any number of tokens from the Mana Pool
{Artificier} deals 1 target X Energy damage where X is the number of tokens removed this way.

flavorQuotes.text: A crude use of your energy, but effective.

cards.title: Dispel
body: Select an Enchanted target. Destroy all enchantments next to that target.
{Arificier} deals that target 2 Energy damage for each enchantment destroyed this way.

flavorQuotes.text: Time to take back a little{BR}of what I left behind.

cards.title: Siphon
body: {Artificier} deals each up to 5 non-Hero targets 1 Energy damage.
Add a token to the Mana Pool for each target that took damage this way.

flavorQuotes.text: Just take a little from each of you.

cards.title: Leech
body: Remove any number of tokens from the Mana Pool.
{Artificier} deals up to X targets 1 Energy damage, where X is the number of tokens removed.
{Artificier} regains 1 HP for each target dealt damage this way.

flavorQuotes.text: I can just take the Life Energy I need from these guys.

cards.title: Overload Mana
body: Remove all tokens from the Mana Pool, and destroy all Enchantments in play.
{Artificier} deals all non-Hero targets and himself X Energy damage, where X is the number of tokens removed from the Mana Pool.
Reduce damage dealt by {Artificer} by X until the end of his next turn.

flavorQuotes.text: That is my [b]HUSBAND[/b]!

cards.title: Gravity Well
body: At the end of your turn, remove a token from the Mana Pool or destroy this card.
Play this card next to a non-Hero target. When that target leaves play, destroy this card.
Increase damage dealt to this target by 1.
When this card is destroyed, reduce the next damage of the enchanted target by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: INCOMING!

cards.title: Confuse
body: At the end of your turn, remove a token from the Mana Pool or destroy this card.
Play next to a non-Character Villain target. When that target leaves play, destroy this card.
When that target would deal damage, redirect it to the Villain character they belong to.
When this card is destroyed, the enchanted target deals itself 2 Psychic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Why are you hitting yourself?

cards.title: Haste
body: At the end of your turn, remove a token from the Mana Pool or destroy this card.
Play next to a Hero Character. When that target leaves play, destroy this card.
That Hero may play an additional card during their Play Phase.
When this card is destroyed, the enchanted hero may draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Something something gotta go fast or something.

cards.title: Thorns
body: At the end of your turn, remove a token from the Mana Pool or destroy this card.
Play next to a Hero Target. When that target leaves play, destroy this card.
When that target is dealt damage by a non-Hero target, they deal the source of that damage 2 Energy damage.
When this card is destroyed, the Enchanted target may deal 1 Target 2 Energy damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Ow! What sorcery is this?
I told you it would hurt you more.

cards.title: Seal
body: At the end of your turn, remove a token from the Mana Pool or destroy this card.
When this card enters play, put a Nonindestructible Relic or Ongoing under this.
When this card is destroyed, you may remove 2 tokens from the Mana Pool to destroy the card underneath it. Otherwise, return it to play.

flavorQuotes.text: There will be no using [b]that[/b].

cards.title: Mana Collector
body: At the start of your turn, add a token to your Mana Pool.

flavorQuotes.text: I crafted these for you,{BR}to enhance your Mana powers.

cards.title: Mana Crystal
body: At the start of your turn, you destroy this card.
When this card is destroyed, add 3 tokens to your Mana Pool.

flavorQuotes.text: They're a bit like rechargable batteries.

cards.title: Life Converter
body: When {Artificier} destroys a target, add a token to the Mana Pool.
At the start of your turn, {Artificier} may deal himself 2 Energy damage. Add tokens to your Mana Pool equal to the damage {Artificier} takes this way.

flavorQuotes.text: This can convert Life Force into Mana, a hefty price, but sometimes necessary.

cards.title: Arcana Recycler
body: At the end of your turn, you may remove 2 tokens from your Mana Pool. If you do, you may search your trash for a spell card and put it into your hand.

flavorQuotes.text: OnceAgain actually helped me{BR}decipher this one, "As it was Once, so it will be Again."

cards.title: Symbiotic Evolution
body: At the start of your turn, choose Play Phase or Draw Phase.
During this turn you get an extra action in that Phase.

flavorQuotes.text: Interesting! Since you recieved the Gauntlets at a young age, they molded you to be a stronger host!

cards.title: Prepared Spell
body: Search your deck for a Spell and put it into your hand.
You may remove 2 tokens from your Mana Pool to play a Spell.

flavorQuotes.text: I see our games have helped you.

cards.title: Complex Research
body: Reveal the top 5 cards if your deck.
Put any Spell and Enchantment cards into your hand.
Shuffle any Relics back into your deck
Put any remaining cards into your trash.

flavorQuotes.text: Does his research always look like this?
There's usually more hand waving.

cards.title: Quest Complete!
body: You may search your deck for an Equipment card and put it into play.

flavorQuotes.text: Beautiful, isn't it? It's what we came for.

cards.title: Delayed Activation
body: When this card is destroyed, you may play an Enchantment.
At the start of the Villain turn, you may destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: What's he waiting for?
The right moment.
